item.title: The Complete Guide to Zero Balance Accounts in India (2025 Edition)
item.description:
Introduction: The Zero Balance Revolution

In 2025, Indian banking has transformed dramatically. The burden of maintaining minimum balances and facing penalties for non-maintenance is becoming a relic of the past for informed consumers. Zero balance savings accounts do not charge any penalties on zero balance and come with multiple benefits for the accountholders.

However, there’s a critical distinction most guides overlook: Not all zero balance accounts are created equal.

Many banks promote BSBDA (Basic Savings Bank Deposit Account) under schemes like Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana, but these come with significant limitationsâ€”typically only 4 withdrawals per month, no chequebooks, and restricted digital access.

item.title: Best Credit Cards in India 2025: Top Cashback and Rewards Options
item.description:
Best Credit Cards in India 2025: Top Cashback and Rewards Options

In the ever-evolving landscape of personal finance, credit cards have become indispensable tools for savvy consumers looking to maximize their spending benefits. As we navigate through 2025, the Indian credit card market is more competitive than ever, with banks offering lucrative cashback and rewards programs tailored to different spending patterns. Whether you’re a frequent online shopper, a food delivery enthusiast, or someone who values travel perks, there’s a credit card designed specifically for your lifestyle.
